name: Turbo Snail - Glide And Fly Through The Air
name_original: Turbo Snail - Glide And Fly Through The Air
description:
___________________________________ 
„Very cool snail characters!”
„Hours of playing fun”
“Want to beat my high score every time”
___________________________________

Turbo Snail is a lovely game about a snail that can Turbo himself up to great speeds! When you go fast enough you even can fly to space! Collect coins on your way to unlock 4 extra characters and 4 extra levels. You can choose a snail with a spoiler or exhaust on his wheel. The controls are very easy, just touch the screen and you go faster when you go downhill. If you go slower you will come faster to the Finish line, so hold on to your speed and keep away from the finish line, or else you are game over. One thing is for sure: you will love this game!

Download Turbo Snail today while its FREE!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Available for iPhone/iPad
5 Characters
5 Levels
In-app purchases available
Great graphics
Fun and addictive gameplay
100% FREE by ads
Upgrade to ad-free version
Hours of playing fun
Turn on/off the music
